mapper.sql: id, href, creator, cname, consumer, `template`, ctime, expire, `location`, radius, max_absorbers, origin_absorber, origin_person, batch_no, `state`, note

select
distinct
from qrcode_slice
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into qrcode_slice (id, href, creator, cname, consumer, `template`, ctime, expire, `location`, radius, max_absorbers, origin_absorber, origin_person, batch_no, `state`, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{href,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{template,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expire,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{radius,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxAbsorbers,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{originAbsorber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select count(*) from qrcode_slice qrslice where qrslice.state=0 and qrslice.creator=(select creator from qrcode_slice where id=#{qrsliceId}) and qrslice.id!=#{qrsliceId};
